name: Dockpeek
description: A lightweight, self-hosted Docker dashboard that provides quick access to all running containers and their exposed ports with one-click access to web apps.
author: BigBearTechWorld

before_install.en_us:
**Support BigBearTechWorld**: https://ko-fi.com/bigbeartechworld
**Community Forum**: https://community.bigbeartechworld.com
**Read this before installing**: https://community.bigbeartechworld.com/t/added-dockpeek-to-bigbearcasaos/4136?u=dragonfire1119

Before you install, make sure to change the default credentials (SECRET_KEY, USERNAME, PASSWORD) for security.

description.en_us: Secret key for the application. Change this for security.
Username for authentication. Change this from default.
Password for authentication. Change this from default.
